statements: DELETE FROM user_behavior_tracking WHERE action_type = 'click' AND page_visited = '/contact';
DELETE FROM user_behavior_tracking WHERE action_type = 'login' AND page_visited = 'homepage';
DELETE FROM UserBehavior WHERE user_id = 500 AND behavior_type = 'click';
DELETE FROM UserBehavior WHERE user_id = 100 AND behavior_type = 'click';
DELETE FROM user_transactions WHERE user_id IN (SELECT user_id FROM user_profiles WHERE age > 30);
DELETE FROM behavior_analysis WHERE user_id = 101 AND result = 'successful'
DELETE FROM transaction_history WHERE amount < 1000 AND timestamp < '2023-01-01'
